headline: Activist Elliott shakes up leadership at Lululemon. How the firm can help reinvigorate the athleisure giant
summary: Elliott has amassed a stake of more than $1 billion in Lululemon, and it has brought along Jane Nielsen as a potential CEO candidate.

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Lululemon (LULU) After A 48% Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether lululemon athletica shares are now priced for a comeback or still look expensive, this article walks through what the numbers are saying about value today. The stock recently closed at US$203.90, with returns of 8.7% over the last 30 days, a 3.3% decline over the last week, and a 48.4% decline over the past year. This may signal that expectations and perceived risk have shifted. Recent headlines have focused on how the athleisure space is evolving. Investors...
